titles.title: Honoring the life and legacy of Corporal Christopher Jackson Dye for his service and devotion to his community.
Honoring the life and legacy of Corporal Christopher Jackson Dye for his service and devotion to his community.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: This resolution honors the life and legacy of Corporal Christopher Jackson Dye, a Road Patrol Corporal with the Walker County Sheriff's Office in Georgia who died following fentanyl exposure during an arrest.
